description:
Author Stephen King is quite fond of showing support for other projects outside of his own. King, having created some of the greatest books and movies of our modern era, tends to be rather credible with his recommendations. As such, Max subscribers might be interested in checking out the top horror movie added to the [...]

The post Stephen King Praises Top Horror Movie On Max appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Stephen King Praises Top Horror Movie On Max
